Title: Major Roadblocks That Hinder Business Growth
Description:
Today, we’ll hear from:

•      A business owner struggling to get one of his leaders to delegate

•      A business owner wanting to know next steps to level up her business’s revenue

•      An Instagram follower asking how to scale a business without capital

•      A business owner wondering if he should pay himself more or reinvest in the business

•      A business owner wanting advice on if he should buy new or used equipment for his business
